column1: 1. If the barcode has been used by an existing Master Product in Catalog, then proceed to create the product item as new Master Product without the barcode.

2. If the barcode is shared by multiple product items due to they are same product with different variation only (e.g. T-Shirt (Red), T-Shirt (Blue, etc), then put the barcode at the 1st product item only and leave the rest of the product items with empty barcode.
3. If the case submitted is through Formstack/Help Center, then follow the Barcode Exemption Logic that is meant for FS/HC cases only (please consult your Team Lead if unsure).
4. For Vape products, please proceed with the menu update/creation as per usual (Special Allowance for MY Only).
